title: Coordinator/Architect/Implementer/Verifier agent runtime + structured handoffs
goal: Implement a local agent runtime that can run multiple role agents, coordinate their outputs, and enforce tool access policies and handoff formats.
steps: Define role prompts/contracts and a coordinator state machine.
Implement parallel agent execution with deterministic outputs where possible.
Implement tool access policies (allowlisted commands, filesystem allowlists).

rollback.strategy: Revert agent runtime and role definitions.
